<span className="text-sm font-semibold text-zinc-900 dark:text-white uppercase tracking-wider flex items-center gap-2 mb-0">
WHAT is this?
</span>

<span className="ml-2 font-bold">AI</span> is a beautiful startup business template designed and built with Next.js, Tailwind CSS, and Motion. It's perfect for showcasing your AI startup with a clean, futuristic design and smooth animations that will captivate your audience.

The whole website can be installed with a single click and is easily customizable. It's built with best practices and the latest technologies, including Next.js 15, React 19, TypeScript 5, and Tailwind CSS v4, ensuring a modern and high-performance foundation for your project.

<WhatIncluded templateName="startup-template" />
